slam.frontend_manager.graph_builder.candidate_factory.candidate_analyzers.analyzer_ABC module

class slam.frontend_manager.graph_builder.candidate_factory.candidate_analyzers.analyzer_ABC.CandidateAnalyzer[source]

Bases: ABC

Base abstract class for candidate analyzers.

Analyzes a graph candidate if it is ready to be merged with Graph.

abstract check_readiness(graph_candidate: GraphCandidate) → bool[source]

Evaluates existing state(s) of a candidate and decides if it is ready to be merged with the graph.

Parameters:

graph_candidate – GraphCandidate instance to be analyzed.

Returns:

success/failure status of a new graph candidate.

slam.frontend_manager.graph_builder.candidate_factory.candidate_analyzers.lidar_submap_analyzer module

class slam.frontend_manager.graph_builder.candidate_factory.candidate_analyzers.lidar_submap_analyzer.LidarSubmapAnalyzer[source]

Bases: CandidateAnalyzer

Simple analyzer for lidar pointcloud sub-map candidate.

check_readiness(graph_candidate: GraphCandidate) → bool[source]

Checks graph candidate if readiness criterion is satisfied. Criterion: 1 state with lidar pointcloud is present in the candidate.

Returns:

the readiness status.

Return type:

status
